description: Try our easy to follow Bread Spoons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bread Spoons Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the spoons, trim crusts from 15 slices of bread (1 slice makes 2 spoons). Roll out until thin. Using a small, sharp knife cut out spoon shapes. Spray each piece with oil spray and lay onto a metal Chinese soup spoon. Bake for 15 minutes at 180°C until golden and crisp. Cool and fill with the following toppings: Diced rockmelon, prosciutto and shredded basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Crab, diced avocado and radish or chives.
Rare roast beef and hot mustard cream (hot English mustard mixed into sour cream).

Parmesan onion cream: Combine 3/4 cup finely chopped onion, 1/3 cup grated parmesan, 2 tbs mayonnaise, 1 tbs sour cream and 1/4 tsp ground paprika in a bowl. Note: You can also cut out 4cm rounds from rolled sliced bread. Spray with oil, press into patty pans and bake until golden.
